channel.description: Recent content in history on Hugo

item.title: History
item.description: CDAP started as an open source project in 2011. CDAP was developed by Cask Data Inc. that was acquired by Google in 2018. CDAP has been in development for more than 8+ years and is running in production in multiple enterprises for about 5+ years. CDAP post-acquisition has had continued support at Google and its support and commitment to keep it open source. Cloud Data Fusion (CDF) is a fully-managed offering of CDAP on GCP stack.
